name: Kazuki Nakajima
introduction: Kazuki Nakajima (  in Japanese; born 11 January 1985) is a former Japanese Formula One driver who competed for Williams from 2007 until 2009 as the team's test and race driver. He is the son of former F1 driver, Satoru Nakajima. Nakajima has a younger brother, Daisuke Nakajima, who is currently competing in Super GT and Super Formula.
